thread.title: The Chainsmokers And Coldplay Finally Made A Song Together, Much To The Glee Of White Girls Everywhere
thread.title_full: The Chainsmokers And Coldplay Finally Made A Song Together, Much To The Glee Of White Girls Everywhere

author: Brandon Wenerd
title: The Chainsmokers And Coldplay Finally Made A Song Together, Much To The Glee Of White Girls Everywhere
text:
Twitter 
Coldplay has literally been on the butt-end of “ Things White People Love ” jokes since, like, 2008. In the last few years they’ve been replaced by The Chainsmokers as The Ultimate Hollister Shopping Spree Soundtrack band, so it was only a matter of time before Alex Pall and Drew Taggart linked up with Chris Martin for an white girl anthem. Coldplay teased it a few weeks ago and today people who love Nicholas Sparks movie adaptations got that wish. excited for @thechainsmokers ' album; I've heard some songs and I love them. cm 
It’s called “Something Just Like This” off the forthcoming Chainsmokers album Memories . 
And, of course, Twitter has mad jokes: Coldplay and The Chainsmokers made a song together…. can't wait to hear it every 5 minutes at a party and see every white girl bumping it
